page.title: 04Coombe Hill Village Study
page.content: Coombe Hill stands on the busy A38 road there are about 40 buildings but no schools.The younger children have to go 3 miles to their nearest school. The older children have to go 6 miles. There is 1 Post Office,2 Garages,1 Pub and 1 Public Telephone box in the Coombe Hill area.There are no entertainments in Coombe Hill except the Swan Inn.The nearest entertainments are in Tewkesbury where there are disco's,Bingo and a Cinema. A Caravan Park is being built behind the Pub for the tourist trade.The nearest place for shopping is Tewkesbury,some go to Cheltenham.The bus service runs every 2 hours to Cheltenham and Tewkesbury.Most people also have cars.Most people work outside,away from the village as there is no industry there.The area is quiet and convenient for the M5 Motorway.
